name: Star Wars: The Old Republic - Galactic Starfighter
name_original: Star Wars: The Old Republic - Galactic Starfighter
description:
Star Wars: The Old Republic - Galactic Starfighter is an action-RPG massively multiplayer game developed by BioWare. It came out on 03-12-2013. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Star Wars: The Old Republic - Galactic Starfighter is available on PC.
